name: Hina
text:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Block] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. The chosen Character cannot attack during this turn.

effect.text: Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. The chosen Character cannot attack during this turn.
